fact_check_explanation_title: The NHS isn’t asking for payment for Covid-19 vaccination passes
fact_check_explanation_summary: Scam emails purporting to be from the NHS are demanding money for a ‘Coronavirus Digital Passport’ to prove vaccination status.

fact_check_explanation_title: All health secretaries become a shareholder of Genomics England
fact_check_explanation_summary: This is a part of the job, rather than a personal role for Matt Hancock.

fact_check_explanation_title: Japan hasn’t banned Olympic athletes from taking the knee
fact_check_explanation_summary: Rules prohibiting demonstrations or protests at Olympic venues have been in place for decades.

fact_check_explanation_title: Ronaldo didn’t visit a mosque in Birmingham
fact_check_explanation_summary: Footage of a lookalike of the Portuguese footballer has been widely shared online.

fact_check_explanation_title: ‘My First Vape’ toy is not real
fact_check_explanation_summary: The mocked up packaging was produced by a Twitter account previously behind a children’s ‘Happy Hour Playset’.

fact_check_explanation_title: You can’t tell how a banana was ripened by looking at it
fact_check_explanation_summary: Claims that naturally ripened bananas look different from chemically ripened bananas are false.

fact_check_explanation_title: Hydroxychloroquine study not all that it seems
fact_check_explanation_summary: Patients may have been given more of the drug because they lived longer—not the other way around.

fact_check_explanation_title: Fake memo circulating claiming to be from Imperial College
fact_check_explanation_summary: The memo allegedly sets out plans for a permanent lockdown of the UK but has no credible source and makes false claims.

fact_check_explanation_title: Covid-19 victims cannot be cremated against their wishes
fact_check_explanation_summary: A post on Facebook also wrongly claims that asymptomatic transmission is a hoax, PCR tests are useless and Covid-19 death statistics have been manipulated.
Covid-19 and Brexit mean trade volumes are incredibly volatile at the moment. We take a look at some of the claims about the latest data.

fact_check_explanation_title: British Airways is not in ‘crisis talks’ with the government about vaccinated pilots
fact_check_explanation_summary: There is no evidence three pilots died of the Covid-19 vaccine. Four pilots have recently died, but BA says these are not linked.
A clip of a woman calling a Bristol hospital claiming most of its “positive” cases are false has been shared on social media.
